text: Jerusalemi kuma'ma ha'ma eme huntaza vahe'mo'za ana kumara kegava hazageno zamagri eri'za vahe mani'ne. Ana nehu'za agri ha' vahe'mo'za Jerusalemi kumapina knare hu'za mani fru hu'za mani'naze. Jerusalemi kumapi vahe'mo'za tusi kumi hu'nazagu huno, Ra Anumzamo'a knazana atregeno eno eme zamazeri haviza hu'ne. Ana hazageno ha' vahezmimo'za mofavre nagazmia zamavare zamavugate'za vu'za afete moparega kina ome huzmante'naze.
